sentences.en: Associated Minerals are halite , calcite , sulfur , pyrite , borax and many others.
sentences.cn: 伴生矿物是岩盐， 方解石， 硫， 硫铁矿， 硼砂和其他许多领域。

sentences.en: Gypsum and halite are simply thinned or removed altogether.
sentences.cn: 石膏与岩盐则逐渐变薄或完全被溶解掉.

sentences.en: Table salt is halite that has been purified by a chemical process that prevents the mineral from absorbing moisture.
sentences.cn: 食用盐是一个由化学过程净化了避免吸引湿气的矿物的岩盐。

sentences.en: These resources include: coal, petroleum, natural gas, halite, antimony, Hg, gold, silver, lead, zinc and precious stone, etc.
sentences.cn: 这些资源包括：煤炭、石油、天然气、岩盐、锑、汞、黄金、白银、铅、锌和宝石等。

trans.tran_en: a colourless or white mineral sometimes tinted by impurities, found in beds as an evaporite. It is used to produce common salt and chlorine. Composition: sodium chloride. Formula: NaCl. Crystal structure: cubic
